name: Karnapu Sravanthi

summary: Full-stack web developer with hands-on experience building and deploying scalable applications using Node.js, Express.js, Spring Boot, MySQL, and JavaScript. Strong in backend APIs, database design, and authentication systems. Seeking Web/Backend Internship roles to build production-grade software.

experience.description: Built a responsive web interface using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to present AI project outcomes. Integrated AI-generated outputs into frontend dashboards. Optimized UI components and reduced latency by 15% through performance improvements.

projects.description: Built a full-stack web application to automate employee attendance and leave approvals. Implemented authentication, role-based access, and secure REST APIs using Express.js. Deployed on Render.
